message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations, considering the potential benefits you'll reap.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While $1,200,000 represents a fair assessment of the product's value, I understand your budgetary concerns.  I'd be willing to come down to $1,100,000. I believe this price reflects a good balance between its worth and our mutual desire to close a deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I respect your decision to meet my budgetary constraints. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000.
